fusilli.utils.csv_loss_plotter

Plotting the loss from a CSV file generated by the training process when params[“log”] is set to False. (If set to True, then a weights and biases logger is used.)

Functions

plot_loss_curve(params, logger[, show])

Plots the loss curve from a CSV file generated by the training process.
plot_loss_curve(params, logger, show=False)[source]

Plots the loss curve from a CSV file generated by the training process. The figure is saved to params[“loss_fig_path”] if show is False, otherwise it is shown with plt.show().

Parameters:

  • params (dict) – Dictionary containing the parameters for the model.

  • logger (pytorch lightning logger) – Logger that was used to log the training process. CSVLogger.

  • show (bool) – If True, show the plot. If False, save the plot to a file. Default: False.

Return type:

None
